thread.title: Emma Stone, Viola Davis and Octavia Spencer reunite | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Emma Stone, Viola Davis and Octavia Spencer reunite | Daily Mail Online

author: Justin Enriquez For Dailymail.Com
title: Emma Stone, Viola Davis and Octavia Spencer reunite | Daily Mail Online
text: Share Emma looked stunning in a navy off-one-shoulder jumpsuit with black velvet heels. Her signature red tresses were worn down into waves flowing over her shoulder as she let her natural looks show with complimentary make-up. Keeping cool: The 28-year-old actress donned a navy off-one-shoulder jumpsuit with black velvet heels Pretty in patterns: Viola, 56, rocked a red and white checked midi along with black leather heels Casual chic: Octavia, 46, wore a patterned blue and white jacket over white trousers and navy heels. Viola, 56, rocked a red and white checked midi along with black leather heels. Octavia, 46, went casual chic in a patterned blue and white jacket over white trousers and navy heels. The trio starred together in the flick that detailed African American maids' point of view during the civil rights movement in the 1960s. Tough luck: At the 2012 Oscars the drama was nominated for Best Picture but ultimately lost out to The Artist Big moment: Octavia did taste Oscar gold, however, as she won Best Performance by an Actress in a Supporting Role At the 2012 Oscars the drama was nominated for Best Picture but ultimately lost out to The Artist. Octavia did taste Oscar gold, however, as she won Best Performance by an Actress in a Supporting Role. Viola was nominated for Best Performance by an Actress in a Leading Role but was bested by Meryl Streep for her role in The Iron Lady. Moving and grooving: This year it is Emma who is nominated for Best Performance by an Actress in a Leading Role for her role in La La Land On the promo trail: Emma was seen later that same day making chat show appearances Plugging La La Land: First on the star's agenda was a spot on Jimmy Kimmel Live! This year it is Emma who is nominated for Best Performance by an Actress in a Leading Role for her role in La La Land. Viola and Octavia are battling it out for Best performance by an Actress in a Supporting Role for their roles in Fences and Hidden Figures, respectively. The 89th Oscars - hosted by Jimmy Kimmel - are set to air on February 26, 2017 at 7pm on ABC. Shining star: Viola is nominated for Best performance by an Actress in a Supporting Role for her role in Fences Going for gold: Octavia is up against her famous co-star in the actress in a supporting role category for her work in Hidden Fences Share or comment on this article 262
